subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Frank Schleck held on to a narrow lead in the Tour de France and two of the top riders heading in to the 16th stage lost valuable time on a mountain descent that saw several riders crash.
snippet: Frank Schleck held on to a narrow lead in the Tour de France and two of the top riders heading in to the 16th stage lost valuable time on a mountain descent that saw several riders crash.
